tool_description: Blockchain is the world's leading software platform for digital assets.
name: Blockchain
title: Blockchain

api_list.name: convertAddressToHash
api_list.description: Converts a bitcoin address to a hash 160.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: convertAddressToPublicKey
api_list.description: Converts an address to public key (if available)

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: convertHashToAddress
api_list.description: Converts a hash 160 to a bitcoin address.

api_list.name: convertKeyToAddress
api_list.description: Converts a public key to an Address

api_list.name: convertKeyToHash
api_list.description: Converts a public key to a hash 160

api_list.name: convertToBTC
api_list.description: Convert x value in the provided currency to btc.

api_list.name: getAddressBalance
api_list.description: Get the balance of an address (in satoshi).

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: getAddressReceivedNumber
api_list.description: Get the total number of bitcoins received by an address (in satoshi).

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: getAddressTimestamp
api_list.description: Timestamp of the block an address was first confirmed in.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: getAddressTransmitBitcoins
api_list.description: Get the total number of bitcoins send by an address

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

api_list.name: getBalance
api_list.description: List the balance summary of each address listed.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or xpub

api_list.name: getBlockForSpecifiedHeight
api_list.description: Return a block for specified height

api_list.name: getChartData
api_list.description: Return a data for charts

api_list.name: getCurrentBlockHeight
api_list.description: Current block height in the longest chain

api_list.name: getCurrentBlockReward
api_list.description: Current block reward in BTC

api_list.name: getDataBehindCharts
api_list.description: Get the data behind Blockchain's charts.

optional_parameters.name: sampled
optional_parameters.description: Boolean set to 'true' or 'false' (default 'true'). If true, limits the number of datapoints returned to ~1.5k for performance reasons.

optional_parameters.name: rollingAverage
optional_parameters.description: Duration over which the data should be averaged. Example: 8hours

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Datetime at which to start the chart.

optional_parameters.name: timespan
optional_parameters.description: Duration of the chart, default is 1 year for most charts, 1 week for mempool charts. Example: 5weeks

api_list.name: getDataBehindPoolsInformation
api_list.description: Get the data behind Blockchain's pools information

optional_parameters.name: timespan
optional_parameters.description: Duration over which the data is computed, maximum 10 days, default is 4 days. Example: 5days

api_list.name: getDataBehindStats
api_list.description: Get the data behind Blockchain's stats

api_list.name: getDayBlocks
api_list.description: Get blocks for one day

api_list.name: getExchangeRate
api_list.description: Returns a JSON object with the currency codes as keys. `15m` is the 15 minutes delayed market price, `last` is the most recent market price, `symbol` is the currency symbol.

api_list.name: getLatestBlock
api_list.description: Return latest block data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com/getLatestBlock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com/getLatestBlock"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getMultiAddress
api_list.description: Return data for multi address

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or xpub

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset parameter to skip the first n transactions. (Page 2 for limit 50)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit parameter to show n transactions. (Default: 50, Max: 100). This parameter does not work stably.

api_list.name: getPoolBlocks
api_list.description: Get blocks for specific pool

api_list.name: getSingleAddress
api_list.description: Return data for single address

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or hash160

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit parameter to show n transactions. (Default: 50, Max: 50)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset parameter to skip the first n transactions. (Page 2 for limit 50)

api_list.name: getSingleBlock
api_list.description: Return a single block

api_list.name: getSingleTransaction
api_list.description: Return a single transaction

api_list.name: getTransactionFree
api_list.description: Get fee included in a transaction (in satoshi).

api_list.name: getTransationTotalInputValue
api_list.description: Get total input value of a transaction (in satoshi)

api_list.name: getTransationTotalOutputValue
api_list.description: Get total output value of a transaction (in satoshi)

api_list.name: getUnconfirmedTransactions
api_list.description: Return unconfirmed transactions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com/getUnconfirmedTransactions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com/getUnconfirmedTransactions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "BlockchainzakutynskyV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getUnspentOutputs
api_list.description: Return unspent outputs

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address can be base58 or xpub

optional_parameters.name: confirmations
optional_parameters.description: Confirmations parameter to limit the minimum confirmations. (Page 2 for limit 50)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit parameter to show n transactions. (Default: 250, Max: 1000)
